SELECT t_staff.*, t_position.*, t_department.* FROM t_staff, t_position, t_department WHERE t_staff.position_id=t_position.id AND t_staff.department_id=t_department.id
AND t_department.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{department},'%') AND t_department.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{department},'%')
AND t_position.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{position},'%')
AND t_staff.work_age LIKE CONCAT('%',#{workAge},'%')
